backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor and all core domain types for rooms, styles, users, projects, products, orders, and utility structures.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module initializing vendor, OTP, and verified OTP maps for backend state setup.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for vendor-related frontend additions, including files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router, QueryClient, layout, and all application routes including the new Vendors route.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for creating a new user profile on first login with form validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartBu: Button component that adds a product to the cart with inventory checks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consul: A form for submitting consultation requests, validating input and sending data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and a content area.
frontend/src/components/navigation/BackB: A back button that uses browser history when available or falls back to a provided path.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Renders the site footer with branding, links, social icons, and ordered location listings.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Renders the main site header with navigation, authentication controls, cart count, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/packages/Package: Displays informational sections about the design process and what’s included in design packages.
frontend/src/components/packages/room-pa: Shows a product card with image, description, price, and stock status for included package items.
Displays included products for a room package with sorting controls and renders product cards in a grid.
Shows skeleton loaders representing the product grid and header while data is loading.
Renders package details, pricing, inventory‑based quantity selection, and an add‑to‑cart button with back navigation.
Lists room packages in a grid and highlights the selected package.
Displays a single room package with style, room type, price, and description, supporting selection highlighting.
Shows skeleton placeholders for a loading room package list and header.
frontend/src/components/packages/StylePa: Allows users to filter room packages by style and room type, view details, and add full packages to the cart.
frontend/src/components/products/GlobalP: Provides debounced global product search with loading, error, empty states, and result listing.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, price, stock badge, quantity selector, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/components/products/Quantit: Simple increment/decrement quantity control with max bounds and disabled handling.
frontend/src/components/products/SafeExt: Image component that swaps to a fallback source when the main image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/vendors/VendorRe: Multi‑step vendor registration flow including details entry, OTP verification, and success state.
frontend/src/data/furnitureImageOverride: Maps furniture subcategories to Pexels image URLs and provides utilities to apply default images to products with missing URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller's user profile using the active backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a hook that returns a debounced version of a given value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for backend operations like packages, designers, project briefs, notes, and consultations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/cart/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents with quantity controls, item removal, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation. Shows an empty‑cart state and uses store actions for updates.
frontend/src/pages/checkout/CheckoutPage: Implements the checkout flow including buyer info, delivery address, validation, payment selection, and order placement. Prefills user data and triggers place‑order mutation.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Loads and displays a user's design project briefs with error/loading states and a prompt to start a new project if none exist. Shows project list with basic metadata and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed designer info including bio, styles, and portfolio with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DesignersPage.tsx: Lists designers with search and style filtering, fetching data via useGetDesigners and rendering cards for each designer.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a structured FAQ list using an accordion component with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero, features, and authentication-based navigation to quiz or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the service workflow in a five-step layout with icons, descriptions, and visual cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Runs a four‑step onboarding quiz collecting room type, style preferences, budget, and timeline. Manages step navigation, validation, and persists answers to onboarding store.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProjectBri: Handles review and submission of a project brief, including auth checks, validation, and async brief creation.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays design packages with pricing, features, loading and error states, plus related info sections.
frontend/src/pages/products/DecorLanding: Displays a decor landing page with hero text and a coming‑soon message.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnishingLa: Shows a furnishing category landing page with descriptive hero section and coming‑soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnitureMen: Lists furniture subcategories with links and a hero image for browsing furniture products.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnitureSub: Fetches and displays products for a specific furniture subcategory, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductBrand: Displays products for a specific brand with loading, error, and no‑products handling.
Shows a list of brands with loading and error states and links to individual brand detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductCateg: Displays three product category tiles linking to furniture, furnishing, and decor pages with images and CTA buttons.
Fetches and displays products for a selected category with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/products/RoomCategory: Shows room-based package browsing with a header and renders the StylePackagesSection component.
frontend/src/pages/products/ShopLandingP: Landing page for the shop with search and navigation tiles for room packages, product categories, and brands.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectWorks: Displays project details, notes, and allows adding notes with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RoomVisualizerPage.ts: Provides a manual room visualizer allowing users to upload a room image, pick a product, and drag/scale it on a preview canvas. Handles image upload, product selection, position/scale adjustments, and reset.
frontend/src/pages/vendors/VendorsPage.t: Lists vendors, handles loading and errors, and provides vendor registration UI.
frontend/src/routes/RequireAuth.tsx: Wrapper enforcing authentication, showing login prompt or loading state before rendering children.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, bulk-add, remove, quantity updates, totals, and persistence.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store for onboarding data including room type, styles, budget, timeline, and selected package.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for INR currency and timestamps into date and datetime strings.
frontend/src/utils/locations.ts: Ensures Ahmedabad is always the first item in a predefined location list.
frontend/src/utils/roomPackageSort.ts: Provides sort options and a utility to sort products by name or price in ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including sessionStorage helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state describing vendor-feature requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests.
